sentences.english: Facing the solemn duty badge, we will love the job.
sentences.chinese: 面對莊嚴的稅徽，我們要愛崗敬業。

sentences.english: Skilled employees, love and respect their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 企業員工技術熟練，愛崗敬業。

sentences.english: Being physically and mentally healthy with an out-going personality, showing enthusiasm in teaching and having team spirit.
sentences.chinese: 身心健康，性格開朗，愛崗敬業，具有團隊精神。

selfless/impartial
